gadjets.title: iPhone 13 Pro Max
gadjets.description: The iPhone 13 Pro Max is the top-of-the-line model in Apple's latest lineup of smartphones. It boasts a 6.7-inch OLED display, 5G connectivity, a triple-lens rear camera system, and up to 1TB of storage.
gadjets.subtitle: Gold

gadjets.title: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
gadjets.description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra is a premium Android smartphone that features a 6.8-inch AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, a quad-lens rear camera system, and up to 512GB of storage.
gadjets.subtitle: Phantom Black

gadjets.title: Google Pixel 6 Pro
gadjets.description: The Google Pixel 6 Pro is the latest flagship smartphone from Google. It features a 6.7-inch OLED display, 5G connectivity, a dual-lens rear camera system, and up to 512GB of storage.
gadjets.subtitle: Stormy Black

gadjets.title: OnePlus 10 Pro
gadjets.description: The OnePlus 10 Pro is a high-end Android smartphone that features a 6.7-inch AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, a triple-lens rear camera system, and up to 512GB of storage.
gadjets.subtitle: Morning Mist

gadjets.title: Apple Watch Series 7
gadjets.description: The Apple Watch Series 7 is the latest iteration of Apple's popular smartwatch. It features an always-on Retina display, 5G connectivity, advanced health monitoring features, and up to 32GB of storage.
gadjets.subtitle: Midnight

gadjets.title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 Classic
gadjets.description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 Classic is a premium smartwatch that features a circular AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, advanced health monitoring features, and up to 16GB of storage.
gadjets.subtitle: Black

cards.title: iPhone 13
cards.description: The iPhone 13 is the latest smartphone from Apple, known for its improved cameras and long battery life.

cards.title: Samsung Galaxy S21
cards.description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 is a high-end smartphone from Samsung, known for its advanced features and sleek design.

cards.title: Google Pixel 6
cards.description: The Google Pixel 6 is the latest smartphone from Google, known for its advanced camera features and new design.

cards.title: OnePlus 9 Pro
cards.description: The OnePlus 9 Pro is a high-end smartphone from OnePlus, known for its fast performance and good cameras.

cards.title: Xiaomi Mi 11
cards.description: The Xiaomi Mi 11 is a high-end smartphone from Xiaomi, known for its large display and good camera.

cards.title: Sony Xperia 5 III
cards.description: The Sony Xperia 5 III is a high-end smartphone from Sony, known for its advanced camera features and 5G connectivity.

cards.title: Motorola Moto G Power (2022)
cards.description: The Motorola Moto G Power (2022) is a mid-range smartphone from Motorola, known for its long battery life and affordable price.

cards.title: LG Velvet
cards.description: The LG Velvet is a mid-range smartphone from LG, known for its stylish design and good camera.

cards.title: Nokia X20
cards.description: The Nokia X20 is a mid-range smartphone from Nokia, known for its long battery life and durable design.
